metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Postcard of Hawaiian Rice Fields, Honolulu, TH. He states that the worst part of the trip is over and he will arrive in Yokohama for a 24-hour stay.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
